overview: Prior to One Kings Lane, Jim Liefer was vice president of operations at Walmart.com, the Internet division of the worldâ€™s largest retailer. During his six years there, Liefer was integral to scaling the Walmart.com supply chain and fulfillment operations, growing it to support a multi-billion dollar site. Previously, Liefer was a vice president with UPS Supply Chain Solutions, where he provided logistics solutions for many fortune 500 companies, including operations expansion at Amazon.com and Walmart.com. He also was the vice president of applications at Fritz Companies, a provider of logistics and fulfillment services owned by UPS, where he developed their global supply chain visibility platform (FGV) and provided expertise in implementing retail supply chains and the use of information technology to support large scale operations. Liefer studied business administration at California State University Fresno.
